body_html: If you're loading a binary .pb graph, you'll need to add --input_binary=false to your freeze_graph command line. I believe that's what's causing the error you see in that case, since otherwise it tries to decode a binary file as UTF-8 text.
body_text: If you're loading a binary .pb graph, you'll need to add --input_binary=false to your freeze_graph command line. I believe that's what's causing the error you see in that case, since otherwise it tries to decode a binary file as UTF-8 text.
body: If you're loading a binary .pb graph, you'll need to add `--input_binary=false` to your freeze_graph command line. I believe that's what's causing the error you see in that case, since otherwise it tries to decode a binary file as UTF-8 text.
